text: Thanks.  I too have seen full footage.  My comments were from the hesitancy I saw in some faces.  From some boys who turned away and some who joined in and some who didn't leave their fellow student when a space around him cleared and backed him up.  There was nothing wrong with what I said.  Perhaps you misunderstood.  And guessed what I meant.  It reminded me of a school I once attended.  The Elder walked towards him and got right up in his face.  Too close if it were me.  Fortunately we can both say what we wish and debate.  I wish I saw someone say let's stop.  Let's not do this.  He is an old man.  This may or may not have happened.  We weren't there.
Scary.  Good students will have to hide or get along.  What is going on in that school.  I shudder.
